title: Cash Tracker
description-short: Financial tracking for families who carry cash

title: Starter App
description-short: Everything you need to jump-start a user based application

title: Call Search Tool
description-short: An automated back end that collects call data and a front end to search and filter calls
description-long: An app to automatically collect call details and present them to internal users within the company, so that they can browse, filter, and search for calls. This project encompasses an entire AWS application infrustructure, including a dedicated VPC with public and private subnets, an internet gateway, NAT gateway, and an S3 endpoint. Serverless Lambda Functions are used to process recordings and perform API data collection and data reconciliation.
features: A dedicated VPC (including subnets, gateways, and an S3 endpoint)
Lambda Functions triggered by S3 uploads
Lambda Functions scheduled by CloudWatch Events
Primary code running on an EC2 instance

title: VoIP Statistics Tool
description-short: An app that collects VoIP and system statistics from various services and presents them in a centralized, easy-to-use GUI
features: Pie and bar chart visualizations using D3
Uptime calculated on-the-fly for any time range
Bash scripts to collect images from other web services

title: J. M. M. Nuanez
description-short: Author website with newsletter and contact form
description-long: Author website with newsletter sign-up and a contact form that saves data to a local database and connects to the MailChimp API.
features: Local database for newsletter sign-ups and contact form messages
Contact form emails site administrator and optionally emails the sender
Mailchimp API integration for newsletter sign-ups
JavaScript history API used for pre-order modal

title: Sweet Via Patisserie
description-short: Website for a local bakery with order and contact forms
description-long: Website for a local bakery, with information about the business, news about upcoming events and contact forms for customers to ask questions or place orders.

title: VoIP Software Development
description-short: Building a call routing service with FreeSWITCH and Lua
description-long: With a team, build a new VoIP call routing service on FreeSWITCH. Implement features and bug fixes in Lua, and connect to a MySQL database. Code managed in GitLab.
